TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TickBar extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件为 控件绘制一组刻度线。

span.span: Represents a control that draws a set of tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件绘制刻度的宽度设置为一个像素。The control draws tick marks that have a width of one pixel. 可以通过指定重复间隔或一系列显式点定义刻度线的位置。You can define the location of the tick marks by specifying a repeating interval or a series of explicit points. 控件专门设计用于控件。The control is specifically designed to work with a control. 一个显示刻度线。A displays tick marks. 如下图所示具有。The following illustration shows a that has a . **带有刻度条的滑块****Slider with a TickBar** ![滑块图](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑块图")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 在通常定义控件的。 controls are typically defined in the of a . 有关的示例包含在 ，请参阅[Slider 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md)。For an example of a that is included in a , see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md). 和控件都包含执行相同的功能的属性。The and controls both contain properties that perform the same function. 下表显示属性和相应绑定到的属性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they are bound. 优先属性时和同时指定相关的属性。The properties take precedence when and properties that are related are both specified. **相关的刻度条和滑块属性****Related TickBar and Slider Properties** | 属性 property| 属性 property| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| |||

summary.span: 获取或设置 是否显示选择范围。

value.span: 如果显示选择范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a selection range is displayed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性定义选择范围。The and properties define a selection range. 这些属性必须设置为选择范围时，需要显示设置为`true`。These properties must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 如下图所示控件，其中包含具有定义的选择范围。The following illustration shows a control that contains a that has a selection range defined. ![滑块选择范围](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "滑块选择范围")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置刻度线最大的可能值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value that is possible for a tick mark.
The largest possible value for a tick mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示主要刻度和值和次要刻度显示的其他值。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 对于水平，主计时周期的高度等于的。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 对于垂直，主刻度的宽度等于的。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 次要刻度的大小为 75%的主要刻度的大小。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: The that is used to draw the ticks.

summary.span: 绘制 控件的刻度线。

span.span: Draws the tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性和属性确定绘制刻度线的位置。The values of the property and the property determine where tick marks are drawn in a . 显示主要刻度和值和次要刻度显示的其他值。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 对于水平，主计时周期的高度等于的。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 对于垂直，主刻度的宽度等于的。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 次要刻度的大小为 75%的主要刻度的大小。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. 此方法还绘制在开头和选择范围末尾的计时周期数，如果属性是`true`; 如果和属性的有效性。This method also draws ticks at the beginning and the end of a selection range if the property is `true` and if the and properties are valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用于确保的可见部分，例如正确显示选择范围，这些终结点指示器。The value is used to make sure that the visible parts of the , such as the end point indicators of a selection range, are displayed correctly. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置包含为 指定的刻度线的区域的空间缓冲区。

span.span: Gets or sets a space buffer for the area that contains the tick marks that are specified for a .

value.span: 表示刻度线的行或列的任意一侧的总缓冲区的一个值。

span.span: A value that represents the total buffer area on either side of the row or column of tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由定义的空间缓冲区属性旨在的空间，控件使用的任意一端时。The space buffer that is defined by the property is designed to account for the space that the control uses when it is at either end of the . 值属性分成两部分。The value of the property is divided in half. 一个作为一侧的刻度线集合，缓冲区使用的空间的一半，空间的另一半用作集合的另一端的缓冲区。One half of the space is used as a buffer on one side of the tick mark collection, and the other half of the space is used as a buffer on the other side of the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置刻度线之间的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为一个值，不是该值`null`，则不使用属性。If the property is set to a value that is not `null`, the property is not used. 由指定的时间间隔绘制刻度属性的值处开始属性并继续的值才达到属性。Tick marks are drawn at the interval that is specified by the property, starting at the value of the property and continuing until the value of the property is reached. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刻度线定义的属性，将定义的范围外和属性值不会出现。Tick marks that are defined by the property and that are outside the range that is defined by the and property values do not appear. 当属性设置，不使用属性。When the property is set, the property is not used. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
